name: [JAM] Small World, Little Galaxy
description:
Totally didn't have enough time for #ldjam 38, but I managed to squeeze out this little game anyway.

Learned a ton along the way about new features in GameMaker Studio 2.

Pretty happy where this thing ended up with only ~12 hours of development time.

If I can find another minute, I'll throw in some sounds. Spent too much time fighting (learning) the new camera system and missed a few (nearly all) planned features.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/small-world-little-galaxy
